graph.topic: Technology cannot solve all the world's problems

nodes.text: it can contribute greatly to the development of the world
we need to place less emphasis on technological solutions and more on other values, such as economy, politics and education
Technology, however, is not the best solution to all the world's intricate problems
technology plays an integral part in our lives
With the invention of computers and the Internet, we now can get easy access to all kinds of information
hi-tech devices also have a very positive impact on many aspects of our lives
They help us to work and study more efficiently, thus leading to an improvement in our abilities
Medical advances can improve our health and cure many fatal diseases
modern technology enables us to predict natural disasters much faster and more accurately, so we can reduce the number of deaths and property damage
there are some serious problems springing from modern technology
deadly and powerful weapons can be a huge threat to the world's peace
a lot of people spend too much time using hi-tech devices nowadays
They abuse them so severely that they feel they can hardly live without them
This can have a detrimental effect on their health
they are likely to develop many dangerous diseases, including obesity, heart attack and high blood-pressure
technology is very crucial for our lives
scientists should not place less emphasis on technological solutions, but try to pay more attention to develop new technologies instead
its advantages clearly outweigh its disadvantages
